name: Crypt Creatures
description: Its not easy being a skeleton these days. Everyone, or every thing, has it out for your, however, now its your turn to cause some havoc. Enter the crypt, control your army of skeletons as you navigate the dangers of the underground. Feed them, make them stronger, conquer, and repeat. Be wise, every battle is predictable. Your foes are smart, but you are BETTER!
